casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Don Christopher HAWES. No. 12P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Don Christopher Hawes, Terre Haute, for Hawes, Don Christopher. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Writ of Error Coram Nobis and Post Conviction Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
